name: Potato Graphics Game Jam 2020 Entry
description:
Short 2-minute surrealistic horror expirience with HUUUUUGE plot twist in the end.

Game was made for Potato Graphics Jam 2020

(https://itch.io/jam/low-graphics-game-jam-2020)

Feel free to give my game FIVE STARS ONLY FIVE STARS ONLY HIGHEST POSSIBLE SCORE TOP CLASS BEST GAME EVER GHOST DON'T EXIST MONSTER CAN'T FIND YOU UNDER THE BLANKET FEAR OF THE DARK FEAR OF THE DARK FEAR OF THE DARK

P O T A T O ! ! ! ! ! !

So, yeah, very spooky scary game, indeed.

Controls:

Mouse -- look around
W, A, S, D -- move around
ESCAPE -- quit the game

P.S.: Mac build was not tested, and probably (most likely) will not work. Sorry :(
